mapper.select: select tried_idx, user_id, tried_title, tried_content, tried_img, tried_cnt, tried_rcmd, date_format(tried_created_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as tried_created_time from tried where tried_deleted = 'N' order by tried_idx desc
mapper.insert: insert into tried (tried_title, tried_img, tried_content, tried_created_time, user_id, tried_category_idx) values ( #{triedTitle}, #{triedImg}, #{triedContent}, now(), 'admin', #{triedCategoryIdx})
mapper.select: select tried_idx, user_id, tried_title, tried_content, tried_img, date_format(tried_created_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as tried_created_time, tried_cnt, tried_rcmd, tried_deleted from tried where tried_deleted = 'N' and tried_idx = #{triedIdx}
mapper.update: update tried set tried_title = #{triedTitle}, tried_img = #{triedImg}, tried_content = #{triedContent}, tried_created_time = now(), user_id = 'admin' where tried_idx = #{triedIdx}
mapper.delete: update tried set tried_deleted = 'Y', tried_created_time = now() where tried_idx = #{triedIdx}
